EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Carl, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on my email below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, July 23, 2012 11:23 AM To: 'Carl Craig' Subject: RE: Good Independent consultant who might be a good partner with you... Well I am glad to hear I did not offend you! J From: Carl Craig [mailto:ls1ss169@hotmail.com] <mailto:[mailto:ls1ss169@hotmail.com]> Sent: Friday, July 20, 2012 12:01 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Good Independent consultant who might be a good partner with you... Sara,
No problem! As a military and law enforcement guy, I went by my last name for 28 years!Carl Craig South Riding, Virginia & Villa Rica, Georgia From: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> To: tlindblad1@cox.net <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:tlindblad1@cox.net?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> CC: ls1ss169@hotmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:ls1ss169@hotmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: RE: Good Independent consultant who might be a good partner with you... Date: Fri, 20 Jul 2012 14:30:14 +0000Sorry Carl – I named you as “Craig” below in error! From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, July 20, 2012 10:29 AM To: 'Tom Lindblad' Cc: ls1ss169@hotmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:ls1ss169@hotmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: RE: Good Independent consultant who might be a good partner with you... Hi Tom, Great to hear from you, thanks so much for sending Craig our way – much appreciated! Craig - I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by go here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde%40mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb11Qu0N05/2dc4nukC2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster%40mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb11Qu0N05/2dc4nukC2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tom Lindblad [mailto:tlindblad1@cox.net] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:tlindblad1@cox.net%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, July 19, 2012 11:53 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: ls1ss169@hotmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:ls1ss169@hotmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: Good Independent consultant who might be a good partner with you... Sara, I spoke with you in the fall of 2010 when I joined PDC as an independent. I appreciated the MBO services and your explanation of the advantages. I’d like to introduce you to Carl Craig (571-277-3103), a former associate of mine at AgustaWestland who is initiating his independent consulting work with Mach One Consulting, LLC (http://machoneconsultingllc.com/4752.html <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://machoneconsultingllc.com/4752.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd0IIplQnvaW5Kqb5kjTJdtartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>) and with Proposal Development consultants and OST Global Solutions. He is copied above, and I believe that he is a good match and would appreciate contacting him. Thanks and stay well, Tom Lindblad 703-585-2472
